contents:
那些整天指责脱脂党的人恶臭死叻。说什么为什么整天谈脱支却还用支语。你回答；那是因为别人英语没完全学好...

Well, to me, I learned English because I'm curious to know the world, not because I hate anybody or anyone. The hateness, in fact, is the real barrier between Chinese and the outside world.
You are filled with negative emotions, which you haven't been awared of so far.
And yes, you don't deserve it.
